mapper.sql: id, user_id, summary_id, start_time, end_time, duration_time, plan_time, task, task_state, book_num, type
mapper.insert: insert into task_detail (id, user_id, summary_id, start_time, end_time, duration_time, plan_time, task, task_state, book_num, type) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{summaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{durationTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{planTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{task,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{bookNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT})

id,

mapper.update:
update task_detail
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
summary_id = #{summaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
duration_time = #{durationTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
plan_time = #{planTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task = #{task,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
task_state = #{taskState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
book_num = #{bookNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update task_detail set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, summary_id = #{summaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duration_time = #{durationTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plan_time = #{planTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task = #{task,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_state = #{taskState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, book_num = #{bookNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM task_detail WHERE summary_id = #{summaryId} AND user_id = #{userId}
